analysis.description: COPToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/16/0x1925fd4f9e3f56d29c826bf43ae0349f5987528c.sol#321-328) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/16/0x1925fd4f9e3f56d29c826bf43ae0349f5987528c.sol:
	Contract COPToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0x1925fd4f9e3f56d29c826bf43ae0349f5987528c.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

COPToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/16/0x1925fd4f9e3f56d29c826bf43ae0349f5987528c.sol#298-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/16/0x1925fd4f9e3f56d29c826bf43ae0349f5987528c.sol#300)

COPToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/16/0x1925fd4f9e3f56d29c826bf43ae0349f5987528c.sol#321-328)
	- /unique_chucks/16/0x1925fd4f9e3f56d29c826bf43ae0349f5987528c.sol#326-327
